articles.description: Roston Chase (injury) and Fabian Allen (personal reasons) were unavailable, while Rovman Powell and Romario Shepherd were left out
articles.content: NewsRoston Chase (injury) and Fabian Allen (personal reasons) were unavailable, while Rovman Powell and Romario Shepherd were left out
